title: Are Shared Service Platforms Too Restrictive?
author: Lawrence E Hecht
description: Forty-four percent of participants in a new study by Rafay Systems said they believe the notion that shared services are too inflexible will be their biggest platform engineering challenge this year.
cntitle: 共享服务平台是否过于限制？
cndescription: 在 Rafay Systems 的一项新研究中，44% 的参与者表示，他们认为共享服务过于僵化将是今年他们面临的最大平台工程挑战。
